title: Legendary Kill and Murder Bridge?
body: For a long time my friends have said I was crazy because I have occasionally heard the announcer say "Welcome to murder bridge" (about 4 times now) at the start of ARAM games, but no-one else I know has ever heard it. Recently in an ARAM game, one of my friends got a penta kill then another kill soon after and I heard the announcer say "Legendary Kill" but again, no-one else heard it. Just to make sure I'm not crazy, I wanted to find out if anyone else has heard either of these announcements, I am most interested in the legendary kill as i can't find evidence that it still exists.

replies.body: is norm pretty sure it happens if someone plays ashe lissandra or sejuani
Actually I think it's random. I've had it happen without an Ashe, Liss or Sej in the game.
I have heard murder bridge, but not legendary kill.

Murder bridge usually goes off when there are rivals

Rengar and kha
Kat and Garen
The ice princesses and anivia
Etc

I have heard legendary kill once

Pre lvl 9 the death timer is short enough you can get a hexakill (if you survive long enough, yi does this well) sometimes if that hexakill is from a rival towards a rival (last kill is the riveal) it will say legendary kill i have heard this from a rengar & kha matchup
Yes, these happen. You're not crazy. Or rather, you're not hearing voices.
